text: Black Veil Brides is an rock band that formed in Cincinnati, Ohio in 2006. They won a Billboard award in 2010 for their album, We Stitch These Wounds. They made number #1 on the top independent artists in 2010. The lead singer, Andy Biersack, created the band. == Discography == Studio albums *We Stitch These Wounds (2009) *Set The World On Fire (2010) *Wretched and Divine: The Story of the Wild Ones (2013) *Black Veil Brides (2014) *Vale (2018) == Other websites == *AllMusic chart awards for Black Veil Brides *Biography *Official website Category:American hard rock bands Category:Glam metal bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Musical groups established in 2006 Category:Musicians from Cincinnati Category:Musical groups from Ohio Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles Category:2006 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Ohio
title: Black Veil Brides
